posts.post_content:
Updated: Due to a buyer not following through, a few of the cards are again available.

Please add $2 for confirmed delivery in bubble mailer.  Larger images available in my [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/mwieder/ForTradeSale"]For Sale album[/URL].  I will also be trying to raise some cash from 1 or 2 of the more expensive cards in my album - if something catches your eye, let me know as I'll be listing some below market prices on them soon to try more aggressively to move a few.

T205 Herzog VG-EX w/smear on front $22
T205 Crandall "crossed t" F $15 Sold
T205 Beck VG $20 
T206 Sid Smith P (3 tack holes) $25 Sold
T206 Stark Old Mill G $50
T206 Reagen Old Mill G $50 Sold

[IMG]http://lh3.ggpht.com/_pAhpQ3jIX9M/Sno7z3oZOrI/AAAAAAAAF7c/t3ymuCIUja4/s800/image-2.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://lh6.ggpht.com/_pAhpQ3jIX9M/Sno73LVLlPI/AAAAAAAAF7g/yQkW7lYS2iY/s800/image-3.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take the Smith.  Email [url]rreisshead@aol.com[/url].

Thanks,   Bob

[quote name="reisshead" post=740442]I'll take the Smith.  Email [url]rreisshead@aol.com[/url].

Thanks,   Bob[/QUOTE]

thanks.  It's a holy card!
email sent.
Due to a buyer who didn't follow through, cards are again available.  Priority to first that emails/PMs saying they will take them.
